- The third game (row 3) has an attendance of 40175.

The games with the highest attendance are rows 5 and 7.

- Row 5 has a loss as a result.
- Row 7 has a win as a result.

Since only one of the games with the highest attendance had a loss (row 5), the claim is FALSE.
